General.Name: Sycal Ventures Bhd
General.Description: Sycal Ventures Berhad, an investment holding company, operates as a contractor for building and civil engineering works in Malaysia. It operates in three segments: Construction, Property Development, and Manufacturing and Trading. The company also develops properties; provides property management and consultancy services; and operates a theme park and convention hall. In addition, it manufactures and trades in ready-mix concrete; and trades in building materials. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
